record.description: [University of Chicago Track Team, 1931:] third row: Maurice Ladin, Donald Lowrie, Thomas P. Goodrich, Robert Wallace, Everett Ramsay, William L. Grimes, Raymond K. Fried, and Milton I. Fink; second row: John B. Holt; first row: N. A. Merriam (coach), Walter D. Herrick, Bertram G. Selson, Roy R. Black, Allen Claire East (captain), Dale Allen Letts, Lawrence Brainard, and Julian D. Weiss.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
